markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still unawakened but intent on awakening—I thought: ‘What’s the gratification, the drawback, and the escape when it comes to sights … sounds … smells … tastes … touches … and thoughts?’ …”

SN.35.15. Paṭhamaassādapariyesanasutta (“In Search of Gratification, Interior”)
